dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: Is it morning already? I feel like I just went to sleep...

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: Oh well. There's only so many hours in the day. It's time to get moving.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: Maybe I have time to craft somethingï¿½
Would you like to change clothes?
Diary entry has been added. Would you like to read it?

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: Course I am. Those things didn't know what they were in for.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: "Some of them. I'm sure there's more out there

dialogue.speaker: Gemma
dialogue.text: "That seems like a good sign for sure. So
"Gemma plops a dusty tome in front of you on the table. You two skim the pages
"Gemma guides you through a few spells. You're sure you'll need longer than a day to master them

choices.text: maybe we can learn more about them."

dialogue.speaker: Gemma
dialogue.text: I am... a little bit. It's just so fascinating. I recognize it's been pretty dangerous though.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: It wasn't too bad. The worst they could do was scratch. They were pretty small and spent most of their time holding onto a shard instead of fighting.

dialogue.speaker: Gemma
dialogue.text: Oh! I think you must be talking about a Cosmid. No wonder they're coming here. Those little things love to hoard stars.

dialogue.speaker: Gemma
dialogue.text: I'll keep looking into it. All I know for now is that they have an ability that allows them to teleport a small amount of distance in less than a second.

dialogue.speaker: Gemma
dialogue.text: They'll probably be really good at dodging attacks.

dialogue.speaker: Lulu
dialogue.text: Of course. Let me show you what we've got in stock.

dialogue.speaker: Lulu
dialogue.text: Are you going back out tonight?

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: Yup. I think I'm making headway. I've cleared all of the creatures away that were closest to our borders and saved two stars.

dialogue.speaker: Lulu
dialogue.text: That's great to hear. I'm sure you'll have them gone in no time. We'll be able to start up the Autumn Festival again like nothing ever happened.

dialogue.speaker: Lulu
dialogue.text: Chin up! Just keep doing your best and you might just have a certain pumpkin pie with your name on it.

dialogue.speaker: Hal
dialogue.text: Hey Sunny! What can I do for you today?
"You mount one of the stationary bikes. Under Hal's guidance
You pull on some boxing clubs and start to go toe to toe with Hal. You can't beat him... yet.

dialogue.speaker: Hal
dialogue.text: So how tough were those things?

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: I was able to take care of them without too much trouble. I have a feeling that there'll be more challenges to come though.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: Oh. Yay... I can't wait for that.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: Give me a bit of a break. No one can keep a secret in a town like this.

dialogue.speaker: Hal
dialogue.text: "I'm not too sure about that. With how things are now

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: Let me worry about getting to the bottom of that.

dialogue.speaker: Hal
dialogue.text: Of course. I'm sure you'll figure it out.

dialogue.speaker: Trevor
dialogue.text: Here's what we've got for today.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: I guess I just wanted to talk. All the conversations I've been having these days are about stars and monsters and all that stuff.

dialogue.speaker: Trevor
dialogue.text: I get it. You deserve some time to just relax and not think about it.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: " It'd probably not be all that handy when everything's within walking distance

dialogue.speaker: Trevor
dialogue.text: Sounds fun to me. You could even go out traveling with that. I'm sure it'd be nice to get away from here for a little.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: That's a great idea. I haven't gone anywhere in forever.

dialogue.speaker: Trevor
dialogue.text: It's starting to cool down. It might be nice to drive out to the mountains and check out the snow.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: That sounds perfect... Thanks. For talking with me and everything.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: "I'm good. A little tired and sore

dialogue.speaker: Ivy
dialogue.text: "I'll take your word for it. So then
Ivy walks you through multiple ways of blocking against severe damage. She lets you borrow a few rolls of bandages... just in case.
Ivy brings out multiple odd-looking plants from the back of the clinic. You wonder if this was such a good idea when she has you eat them.

dialogue.speaker: Ivy
dialogue.text: I've been looking into more that could be done to protect you.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: I'm really grateful to all of you.

dialogue.speaker: Ivy
dialogue.text: Do you believe Gemma's magic to be dangerous?

choices.text: I was looking into healing magic. "

dialogue.speaker: Ivy
dialogue.text: Our eyes have really been opened to what she was talking about after this incident.

dialogue.speaker: Ivy
dialogue.text: That's a reasonable way of looking at it. I'll make sure to take everything in consideration before moving forward.

dialogue.speaker: Ivy
dialogue.text: "Try not to land yourself in here

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: H-hey. You're still here. Are you sure you want to stay in that tent? I have room in my house.
Selene fans out a hand of cards and flips them up. She gives you a cryptic smile.

dialogue.speaker: Selene
dialogue.text: Got something you'd like to say to me?

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: "I think you can see the future

choices.text: but there is one thing I can share with you."

dialogue.speaker: Selene
dialogue.text: Many things are hiding in the woods with you - good and bad. Search everywhere you can.

dialogue.speaker: Selene
dialogue.text: I can feel something overwhelmingly powerful wandering about at night.

dialogue.speaker: Selene
dialogue.text: I am sure it will face off against you. You need everything you can to beat it.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: So there's some sort of ultimate monster that wants to hunt me down? That sounds... great.

dialogue.speaker: Selene
dialogue.text: Keep your guard up. I wish you well.

dialogue.speaker: Apollo
dialogue.text: Uh huh. You look exhausted. Maybe you should take a nap before time.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: You wanna tag along with me?

dialogue.speaker: Apollo
dialogue.text: "You know I would if I could

dialogue.speaker: Apollo
dialogue.text: I'm not even offended. I accept the truth.

dialogue.speaker: Sunny
dialogue.text: I'm not going to ask anything of you. Your support's enough.

dialogue.speaker: Apollo
dialogue.text: "Don't mention it. Just keep up what you're doing and kick some butt for me
